currentlyResizeable() - Method in class com.niton.themes.base.ResizeableTheme
Description :
Write here if the frame should be resizeable at the moment.
this often retruns false if the window is fullscreen.

CustomFrame - Class in com.niton.frames
The Custom Frame is A JFrame using a Theme defined by you or a predefined Theme.
A theme is meant to provide a border for the frame
The theme is not changeable later on
CustomFrame() - Constructor for class com.niton.frames.CustomFrame
Creates an Instance of CustomFrame.java
Using the FlatDarkTheme as default
CustomFrame(Theme) - Constructor for class com.niton.frames.CustomFrame
Creates an Instance of CustomFrame
The theme is not changeable later on
CustomRootPane - Class in com.niton.components
This is the CustomRootPane Class
It is responsible to paint the theme
